law.text:
This subtitle does not affect:
a sale or transfer for bona fide resale of a regulated firearm in the ordinary course of business of a licensee; or
a sale, rental, transfer, or the use of a regulated firearm by a person authorized or required to do so as part of the person's duties as a member of:
an official police force or other law enforcement agency;
the armed forces of the United States, including all official reserve organizations; or
the Maryland National Guard.
